description: This header file declares internal functions related to the Slap Var Mapper object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It includes function prototypes for resetting the object, initializing syntax and content type, and retrieving variable syntax and content type by name.

methods.name: SlapVmoReset
methods.description: Resets the state of the Slap Var Mapper object.

methods.name: SlapVmoInitAtoSyntax
methods.description: Initializes the Ato Syntax component of the Slap Var Mapper.

methods.name: SlapVmoInitAtoContentType
methods.description: Initializes the Content Type component of the Slap Var Mapper.

methods.name: SlapVmoGetVarSyntax
methods.description: Retrieves the syntax type of a variable given its name.

methods.name: SlapVmoGetVarContentType
methods.description: Retrieves the content type of a variable given its name.
